insert.foreach: INSERT INTO alarm (alarm_id, alarm_type, email, send_date, alarm_count) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(alarm_id), 0) + 1 FROM alarm), 'movie', #{alarm.email}, SYSDATE, #{alarm.alarmCount})

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM alarm WHERE alarm_type = #{alarmType} AND email = #{email}
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(SUM(alarm_count), 0) alarm_count, alarm_type FROM alarm WHERE email = #{email} GROUP BY alarm_type ORDER BY alarm_type
